# Contributing Guidelines
After forking this repository, you must add a config.json file in `src` folder. <br>
The file looks as follows:
```json
{
    "prefixes": [
        "n!",
        "+"
    ],
    "test_build": {
        "main_guild_id": "",
        "appeals_guild_id": "",
        "token": ""
    },
    "public_build": {
        "main_guild_id": "",
        "appeals_guild_id": "",
        "token": ""
    }
}
```
